data.project_name: DeFiChain - The No. 1 DeFi Project on Bitcoin
data.description:
###How to participate?

1 — Download the DeFiChain Wallet ([Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.defichain.app&hl=en&gl=US) | [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/de/app/defichain-wallet/id1572472820) | [Browser](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/jellywallet-beta/eegcfalgkkhehkhbjbggbhhlcnckadih))

2 — Add DeFiChain to your CoinMarketCap [Watchlist](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/defichain/)

3 — Follow the DeFiChain [Community](https://coinmarketcap.com/community/profile/DeFiChain) account

4 — Follow DeFiChain’s [Twitter](https://twitter.com/defichain) account

5 — Join DeFiChain on [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/defiblockchain/)

6 — Join DeFiChain on [Telegram](https://t.me/defiblockchain)

Learn more about the DeFiChain [here](https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/39333)

###Reward

We will distribute not only DFI Tokens but also dTSLA tokens. dTSLA is a token that mimics the stock value of Tesla. 

Here is what you can win:

- 1,540 Winners: 25$ worth of DFI 

- 50 Winners: dTSLA token worth approx. 230$


###Distribution

Winners will be announced via CoinMarketCap! Prizes will be airdropped by [DeFiChain Accelerator](https://twitter.com/defichainac) to all winners after the event. Wishing you all the very best of luck!

data.project_name: TopGoal x CoinMarketCap 5th NFTs Airdrop Event
data.description:
Simply follow the following tasks:

1 - Add TopGoal to your CoinMarketCap watchlist: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/topgoal/

2 - Follow TopGoal on CMC Community: https://coinmarketcap.com/community/profile/TopGoal

3 - Follow TopGoal on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TopGoal_NFT

4 - Retweet pinned Post - TopGoal x CMC 5th NFT Airdrop: https://twitter.com/TopGoal_NFT/status/1578379176452640770

Check other TopGoal's Airdrop Requirements in detail here! https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/38550

###What is TopGoal?

TopGoal is an officially licensed digital collectibles with NFT and blockchain-empowered metaverse of football, the most popular sport in the world. It partners with world-famous football players, clubs as well as institutions to provide fans with the best experience that NFT and digital games can offer.

###What is TopGoal Return of Legends NFT card?

The TopGoal Return of Legends NFT cards has released in four series by 2022. For each series, TopGoal partners with up to 3 legendary stars. So far, we have partnered with a total of 12 players. They are: Michael Owen, Guti, Alessandro del Piero, Gabriel Batistuta, Christian Vieri, Park Ji-Sung, Wesley Sneijder, Ashley Cole, Edwin van der Sar, Fernando Jose Torres Sanz, Patrice Evra. They enjoy over 100 million fans globally.

Return of Legends NFT card is equivalent to equity certificates, and users can obtain various ecosystem benefits by holding, staking, or locking Return of Legends NFT cards. Users can explore the TopGoal Metaverse better and get more benefits through Return of Legends NFT cards.

data.project_name: AI-enhanced NFT Airdrop by IguVerse x CoinMarketCap
data.description:
###IguVerse x CoinMarketCap unique NFT Airdrop made possible by AI

IguVerse is a SocialFi blockchain game that aims to bring millions of Web2 users into Web3. IguVerse app aims to encourage users to be more social and help animals in a gamified way. We are strong believers in innovation: our original NFTs 2.0 and socialize-to-earn mechanics are paving the way for a new crypto reality.

###Do the following instructions to win:

1 - Follow IguVerse on CoinMarketCap [Community](https://coinmarketcap.com/community/profile/IguVerse/)

2 - Add iguVerse to your [Watchlist](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/iguverse/)

3 - Join our [Telegram Channel](https://t.me/Iguverse)

4 - Follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iguverse)

5 - Retweet the pinned [Tweet](https://twitter.com/iguverse)

6 - Join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/iguverse)

###Learn more about IguVerse [HERE!](https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/33597)

###NFT AIRDROP:

We will airdrop **1000** of our unique playable NFTs, ####1 NFT value is $30.

**Date:** October 20th, 2022 - November 5th, 2022


###Winner Announcement

Winners will be announced via [CoinMarketCap!](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/iguverse/airdrop/). If you have any questions, Join our official platforms and learn the results.

(Note: IguVerse will select verified users and airdrop NFTs to their BSC BEP-20 address before November 20th, 2022. To receive the rewards, users need to have a BSC BEP-20 wallet address)

**CoinMarketCap exclusive AOG Airdrop - $20,000**

Breaking: AgeOfGods gets listed on KuCoin!
https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/37691

Simply follow the following tasks to get a reward!

1 - Add AOG to your watchlist: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ageofgods/

2 - Follow AOG on CMC Community: https://coinmarketcap.com/community/profile/AgeOfGods

3 - Subscribe on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCG7fw4d0yZBUgs4HxmEWhw?sub_confirmation=1

4 - Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ageofgodsnet

5 - Join us on Telegram: https://t.me/ageofgodsnet

6 - Check more AOG Airdrop Requirements in detail here! https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/37638

_________________________________________________________________________________
**What is AgeOfgods**
From the Co-Founding team of Crypto Exchange executives bring you AgeOfGods, the Next-Gen NFT Action Card Game developed by Juego Game studios, where you can play and earn tokens in the process. 

Progress through challenges and level up, get Gear, Climb the Arena ladder, Battle other players to earn tokens each 14 days PVP season.

**What is AOG?**
AOG is the token used to buy ingame Cards, NFT’s, Gold, Exp and PVP tickets. You can use AOG for direct staking and we also have core Farms on PancakeSwap and BiSwap for liquidity farming. We have a 1 token system, there is no other token.

100% of the revenue streams will be used to buy back tokens from the market decreasing the total circulating supply which will drive up the value of the AgeOfGods token. 

Trade AOG NFT's on Binance, Galler and our own Marketplace, royalty fee on each trade will be used to buyback AOG in 1 dedicated buyback wallet.

**Winners**
CoinMarketcap will select 5,000 Winners, we will distribute rewards directly through our vesting portal within 7 days after the airdrop ends. For Example, The rewards can be used to get 3 ingame Cards!

For any questions, we are available 24/7 on Telegram.

data.project_name: NBOX $100,000 - NFT Giveaway - Super Hero Game Launch
data.description:
To celebrate our first #NFTGame “Super Hero” release on the NBOX! 
We are giving away 5001 NFTs (NGuard) totaling over $100,000 in VALUE! This will also include 1 **Legendary** NGuard NFT! 

Simply follow the following tasks: 

1 - Add NBOX to your CoinMarketCap watchlist: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/nbox/

2 - Follow NBOX on CMC Community: https://coinmarketcap.com/community/profile/NBOX 

3 - Follow NBOX on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NboxOfficial 

4 - **Retweet pinned Post - Super Hero Launch Event: https://twitter.com/NboxOfficial/status/1564550434148167680 **

**Check more NBOX's Airdrop Requirements in detail here!** https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/37096

**What is NBOX?**

NBOX is a decentralized GuildFi platform. Based on the BNB blockchain technology, NBOX provides an aggregation platform for players in blockchain application ecology. Innovatively using DAO 2.0 governance, Metaverse through social networking, NFT, and GameFi. No matter what kind of blockchain user you are, you can always find a game in NBOX that allows you to Play to Earn easily. NBOX is an open decentralized game ecosystem pursuing the ultimate transparency, decentralization, win-win, and user experience. 

**Why “Legendary NGuard NFT” is beneficial?**

The Legendary NBOX N-Guard NFT will have a starting HR of 1000. This number is important because it determines the mining power of the NFT and with it the amount of NBOX tokens you can earn. It’s worth noting that the NBOX  Legendary NFT is not just a piece of art, but can also be used across the NBOX platform variety of games.

*Note: All Bot and Duplicate entries will be automatically disqualified

Please follow the steps below to win your SENSO Tokens!!!

1 - Add SENSO to your CoinMarketCap watchlist: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/senso/

2 - Follow the SENSO Community account: https://coinmarketcap.com/gravity/profile/SensoToken

3 - [Optional] Join the waitlist on the SENSO Dapp website: https://dapp.sensoriumxr.com/

4 - Join SENSO Twitter: https://twitter.com/SensoToken and Retweet the pinned post - SENSO Airdrop.

5 - Join Telegram chat: https://t.me/sensotoken_chat 

**What is Sensorium?**

1 - Metaverse is dedicated to high-quality entertainment content, and advanced social and gaming mechanics while featuring  AAA VR graphics based on Unreal Engine

2 - Top 10 DJs, including David Guetta, Armin van Buuren, and Steve Aoki, signed to deliver 30 concerts in 3 years, alongside the world’s first AI-driven artists

3 - Users can interact and create true relationships with virtual beings with advanced features powered by cutting-edge AI technology, including long-term memory and the ability to keep track of context across time and participants

4 - Mobile app with 200,000 early users, available features include avatar creation and Sensorium metaverse streaming

5 - DAPP is under development with P2E mechanics and 10,000 collectible NFTs

6 - SENSO, the in-platform currency token, featured on the top 10 exchanges (KuCoin, Gate, and more)

N.B. The winners will be announced on the SENSO Community page.

The distribution of SENSO tokens to the winners will happen within 14 days after the end of the airdrop (until September 13).

Note: All Bot and Duplicate entries will be automatically disqualified, and CMC is responsible for winner selection.

Good luck!
